Text.val: 27.05.2014 JH SCR18916 Added update of OAD320_GEN_TOTALAMOUNTCURR and OAD320_GEN_CURRENCY
23.04.2014 JH SCR18848 Added update of OAD320_GEN_HASH with CLNA_SHA1CHECKSUM
05.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
@Program uses same button labels as parent program OAD320
-- Button OK (Present advances again to create files by updating CLNA_RUNNUMBER)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNA_RUNNUMBER, min(CLNA_BANK_ADMNO), min(CLNA_FILE_LEDG_NO), min(CLNA_BANKFILETYPE), min(CLNA_SPLIT_URGENT), min(CLNA_HGRP_CODE), min(CLNA_CURRENCY), min(ADMN_NAME), min(BANK_NAME), COUNT(*) as COUNT, cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCEH) as decimal (13,2)), min(CLNA_SHA1CHECKSUM), cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA left outer join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = CLNA_BANK_ADMNO left outer join :1/BANK on BANK_ADMNO = CLNA_BANK_ADMNO and BANK_LEDG_NO = CLNA_FILE_LEDG_NO where CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'Y' and CLNA_PAYMENTDATE = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':3' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') group by CLNA_RUNNUMBER order by CLNA_RUNNUMBER for fetch only

Text.val: -- Start to re-initialize the data set for screen
-- Start to re-initialize the data set for screen
